BrandApplication.title: Brand Application
BrandApplication.description: Represents a brand's application to join the VibeMatch waitlist.

name.description: Full name of the contact person.

company.description: The name of the brand's company.

ice.description: The company's ICE number (Identifiant Commun de l'Entreprise) in Morocco.

city.description: The city where the brand is located.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the application was submitted.

CreatorApplication.title: Creator Application
CreatorApplication.description: Represents a creator's application to join the VibeMatch platform.

whatsapp.description: The creator's WhatsApp number, if different from the primary phone.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the application was submitted.

definition.description: Stores applications from brands wanting to join the waitlist. Anyone can create an application. Only admins should be able to read/list them.

params.name: applicationId
params.description: The unique identifier for the brand application.

definition.description: Stores applications from creators wanting to join the platform. Anyone can create an application. Only admins should be able to read/list them.

params.name: applicationId
params.description: The unique identifier for the creator application.

firestore.reasoning: The structure is designed to securely capture waitlist applications. By using top-level collections `brand-applications` and `creator-applications`, we can apply simple and effective security rules: allow public `create` access while restricting all `read`, `update`, and `delete` operations to prevent data exposure. This ensures that applicant data is private and write-only for anonymous users, adhering to the principle of least privilege.
